decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: DWG001 Rev A Block and Location Plan; DWG100 Rev B Existing Ground and First Floor Plan; DWG101 Rev B Existing Attic and Roof Plan; DWG110 Rev B Existing Elevations and Section; DWG111 Rev B Existing Elevations and Section; DWG200 Rev B Proposed Ground and First Floor Plan; DWG201 Rev B Proposed Attic and Roof Plan; DWG210 Rev B Proposed Elevations and Section; DWG211 Rev B Proposed Elevations and Section; Cover Letter prepared by Evolve Architecture dated 29 May 2021.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Plan Document (2013). | Windows inserted into the side elevations, shall be obscure glazed and non-opening (where openable parts less than 1.7m above floor) unless otherwise confirmed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Reason: To safeguard neighbouring amenity from light pollution in accordance with policy 7A of Ealing's Development Management DPD. | The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall not project more than 150mm from the roof plane and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013). | The extensions hereby approved shall be constructed and completed simultaneously on both 19 & 21 Kent Avenue.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surrounding buildings, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013, policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Alteration of roofs from hip to gable end; rear roof extensions incorporating two Juliet balconies and installation of two rooflights to each dwellinghouse's front roof slope (Joint Application)
